name: Apocalypse Not Now
description:
MadeBy : Hugo(Linkedin), Théo(Linkedin), Enzo(Linkedin), Lou, Tedi

Description:

The game was made for a game convention named the global game jam where as a team, we will build a game on one theme. The theme was “repair” as such we maded “Apocalypse not now” a 3D game where we have to repair earth cataclysm.
